name: The Elf Who Came at Night
name_original: The Elf Who Came at Night
description:
The Elf Who Came at Night

A sad love story told through a narrative poem.

This poem sings about an elf who would come at night in the human prince's room.

The two were in love, but their love was forbidden.

That forbidden love would... well, play the game to find out.

Liked the game?

You can buy me a coffee for 1$ on ko-fi.com or you can donate here any amount you want to show your support. Just press the Download button and contribute a payment of however much you'd like.
